Vue Custom Tooltip comes with four built-in themes that provide different visual styles to match various UI frameworks and design systems.

## Theme Preview

### Default Theme
Clean, modern styling that works well with any design system.

::: tip Default Theme Features
- Subtle shadows and animations
- Rounded corners
- Semi-transparent background
- Smooth transitions
:::

### Classic Theme
Traditional tooltip styling reminiscent of native browser tooltips.

::: tip Classic Theme Features
- Sharp corners
- Solid background
- Simple and familiar
- Minimal styling
:::

### PrimeVue Theme
Matches the PrimeVue UI framework's design system.

::: tip PrimeVue Theme Features
- Consistent with PrimeVue components
- Elegant shadows
- Custom border radius
- Brand-specific colors
:::

### Vuetify Theme
Follows Material Design principles used in Vuetify.

::: tip Vuetify Theme Features
- Material Design aesthetics
- Elevation shadows
- Brand-specific colors
- Roboto font family
:::
